name: moissanite
text: A comment left by moissanite was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ezcmac, Norsef, hargbarf, Thorfinn, kylank, TwoRightFeet, radarjammer, robotman, LordHumungus, mystkmanat, megaskip, clembot, Appers, Archon_Divinus)

name: dropkickpikachu
text: I'm wondering at all the lames for this comment. Is it because he was drunk? Because I think that warrants an extra chubby or two for getting the quote down accurately in the first place.

name: farqussus
text: It's probably because it's an arbitrary quote for no apparent reason.

name: lastpolarbear
text: I think it's a reference to the face Roast Beef is making in Panel 4 - the return of the creepy slit eyes accompanied by a grammatically interesting declarative statement.

name: habnabit
text: A comment left by habnabit was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by howmanywhales, Norsef, ishuta, kylank, katsura, Sargasm, ih8jonmayr, Boyd)

name: shutup_shutup
text: I'm sorry, are you saying that you fail to see the humor of juxtaposing pudding with jello ? Because that's FUNNY.

name: fuzzyshoo
text: yes, but not in a way that anyone cares about

name: puguglypress
text:
Dude, PUDDING!

And JELLO!

name: aperson
text: Mmmmmmmmmm. Dude pudding.

name: dusty
text: The way SNL has been lately I can see them doing a skit where the whole joke is that a guy orders pudding and gets jell-o and they insist that its the same thing. It would go on for 18 minutes and the guest star would be that guy we all hate.

name: puguglypress
text: Katy Perry?

name: dusty
text: Yeah, that's him. And the musical guest would be that one girly boy that the teen girls flock to even though he's obviously as queer as a stuffed unicorn made of 9 dollar bills.

name: snidedk
text: Coming soon to a grocery store near you: Emeril's Essence: Baby

name: jthompson
text: Bam!

name: nicklon
text: I always really like it when roast beef with a tie consults the squirrel, why can't that be a sitcom

name: ntopp
text: I agree. Any strip in which Beef's wearing a shirt and tie and Todd has questions is a strip I can get behind.

name: apatfan
text: A comment left by apatfan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by joeyramoney, kylank, rhymesforkids)

name: sittered
text: Roast Beef is that person whose jokes you always laugh at out of politeness because he has a fragile soul.

name: tapaidhnaomh
text: And look what I did during the break, I already drowned, filleted, and sauteed a baby just for you!

name: sargasm
text: A comment left by sargasm was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by kylank, ssink, Methadone)

name: mc_white
text: Now you gotta leave this infant in at 350 for about an hour, but luckily I've got one that should be just finishing and oh my! look how nicely that Gerber dressing has browned up!

name: chuvak
text: A comment left by chuvak was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by kylank, bearealcoolhand, Darthemed)

name: relaxing
text: Squirrel eyes are black.

name: lateadopter
text: Blister's aren't.

name: straw
text: He is an angel-squirrel.

name: jaldor
text: Sold 'em for coke.

name: mikekitchell
text: I am so glad that the Emeril references are back.

name: lateadopter
text: A comment left by lateadopter was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by kylank, Setzkin, cailetshadow)

name: catachresis
text: I'm pretty sure we haven't seen Emeril's anus.

name: lateadopter
text: How did that happen?  I replied to the comment about Todd's eyes last night, but this morning my reply has moved to the next comment down.  Weird.

name: nighttoad
text: you call it weird, i call it comedic fate.

name: misterspook
text: Yeah, speak for yourself there, buddy.

name: lacrimus
text: Beef's face in panel four is so goddamned giddy.

name: twoply
text: At first I thought he was angry and that panel four took place after hours of trying to explain it to Todd. I look at it as I received two Achewood strips in one day!

name: kilroywashere
text: A comment left by kilroywashere was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by joeyramoney, erributtz, bearealcoolhand)

name: kilroywashere
text:
oh, bother
(bother, bother, oh bother bother...)

name: natjo1986
text: I did have a giggle with that look.

name: coldfrog
text: kinda makes me wonder if he doesn't have more than just a passing interest in the eyebrowed wonder's cooking show.

name: mortshire
text: I have made that face before.  When talking with an aquaintance known to be slow on the uptake, you start to preemptively explain things to them.  You turn to them quickly as your eyes open wide and glaze over.  Your jaw tenses, and you speak with a level but too-loud voice, using the smallest words possible, dancing on the razor-thin edge between unnatural calm and madness.

name: woodenteeth
text: The concept behind this panel supported basically 90% of Sitcoms everywhere.

name: lolcatdeluxe
text:
This panel makes my top five favorite Achewood drawings:
[img]http://home.comcast.net/~vsys114/ache.gif{/img]

name: lolcatdeluxe
text:
[IMGS OFF]
how i make post?

name: mortshire
text:
I CAN HAS WALKTHROUGH? PLSKTHX

(stop it, LOLCats, get out of my head, daaaang iiit)

name: lolcatdeluxe
text: It's nice and roomy in here. Can I crash for a bit?

name: turkfish
text: God only knows where Todd got that baby squirrel from.

name: milesdonovan
text: Probably got it from all that (unprotected) fuckin' he gets up to.

name: nillsner
text: Just as well. He was only going to sell it for a rock anyhow.

name: grayfox
text: What else is he going to do, pray and sweep?

name: zefiel
text: It's too late, Swift already went there , and didn't work over well.

name: straw
text: You don't suppose that part of the joke, hmm?

name: cailetshadow
text: 5 imaginary chubbies for introducing me to this text. Poor Swift, his sense of humor way way ahead of its time.

name: deusoma
text: I wonder how he'd have felt if someone told him he would be remembered in large part as the pioneer of the dead baby joke.

name: epicurus
text: A comment left by epicurus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by lawbot, jeffreyquah, wehavemagnums)

name: lawbot
text:
Since when is Ray's time worth anything? All he does is chill out and embark on ridiculous projects.

I'd say that Ray's involvement is just because Onstad always has Ray involved in shenanigans that involve anything that would approximate a budget.

name: wehavemagnums
text: Time it took to convince Ray to fund the project: 11 seconds.

name: fielding
text:
I scrolled back up to see if it said "ELEVEN SECONDS LATER."
It did not.

name: epicurus
text:
If you calculate Ray's hourly income, he typically seems to make astronomical amounts of money in small amounts of time. I mean, he could be playing piano or making deals with Howard Johnson CEOs or inventing new songs or something.

But I know what you mean.

name: mashuren
text:
Todd, you dummy, that's not a drownin' baby, it's a fricasseein' baby!

Boy, I bet his face is red.

name: fielding
text: The baby's?

name: andrew_
text:
remember pop up video?

well in the 5th panel, it would point out that those are the fake headphones that Ray got with his Airwolf.

name: lhmatt
text: "what the...spray-painted styrofoam discs?"

name: ntopp
text: I thought Teodor broke those.

name: stuart
text: Oh, you mean the VH1 thing. I kept going, "Pop-up... video?"

name: mikeleffel2
text: A comment left by mikeleffel2 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, katsura, Audhumla, G3K)

name: rogergs
text: Todd has altogether the wrong ideas about traditional British cookery.

name: mattylite
text: Shredded suet?  Currants?  Caster sugar?  "Tea towel"?  All in the serice of makin' some Spotted Dick?  Heh, the British.  Those guys crack me up, man.

name: mattylite
text:
And now for the "v" that ought to have been between "ser" and "ice":

v

name: skoora
text: I think "Let's drown this baby down a notch!" would be a little more appropriate.

name: stopeatingmyeyes
text: I think what Emeril actually says ("Let's kick this baby up a notch") would work very well, honestly.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
you're confusing Emeril with Strong Bad.

it is a baby...not The Cheat.

name: misterwolf
text:
I probably should not rate all "Evil" or "Very Evil" strips as 5s, as I know it only encourages Onstad in his sinful ways and makes Jesus cry.

Yet I do. Thank you, Onstad, for revealing the darkness in my soul.

name: catachresis
text:
I don't get Beef's expression in panel 4. Why is he shouting? I didn't like that.
Then I read the alt-text and laughed like a twat, so what can you do

name: misterwolf
text: His mouth looks creepy.

name: relaxing
text:
Current kid status, 9/23
You know how women can%u2019t squat or kneel in modern jeans without a certain cleft showing? Welcome to the preschool ice cream social.

But why were you looking, Onstad!

name: jlynes
text:
Dude, in a situation like that, it is impossible not to get an eyefull of something you don't want.

You turn your head and it's all COIN SLOT COIN SLOT COIN SLOT.

name: rogergs
text: Roast Beef has been through a similar dilemma, albeit Breast Man style .

name: barthexderosa
text: Beef is so mellow, but when he says something to you emphatically, I get a spooky shiver.

name: twohundredninety
text: He is capable of such intensity. Even if he is just explaining a joke really hard.

name: deetak
text: bAM

name: coolbreeze3
text: Oh, Todd. Bless his little squirrel heart.

name: pyromancer
text: I've always thought it an interesting quirk that the strip references both Emeril the chef and Emeril the trashspotter.  I was expecting the show to be about LaGoinagasque.

name: professorhazard
text: You're not the only one.

name: stevepants
text: A comment left by stevepants was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Overmedicated, mystkmanat, DerSquirrel)

name: balvo
text: Beef breaks out the big eyes and some punctuation! I also love how Todd raises his hands to calm Beef down.

name: stopeatingmyeyes
text: "put on your face eyes and sit in your body chair!"

name: goocifer
text: Ray has a telephone jacket, maybe this is his headset sweater?

name: zedpower
text:
I would watch that show.

You'd watch too.

We'd all watch.

name: fallow_fields
text: the squirrel does not understand this word, but the cat explains in terms the squirrel can understand

name: wfl
text:
I'm still trying to figure out just what kind of baby he is about to "drown up a notch". I mean, given Todd's nature to treat squirrels and humans on at least equal footing as far as value-of-life.. Meh, I guess it doesn't matter. Looks vaguely like a squirrel. Maybe it's his crackbaby? Killing two birds with one stone, there!

-WFL

name: stuart
text: Killing one baby from too stoned

name: tekende
text: No.

name: niggar
text: Todd wants to do a skit, not a sketch, because all skits suck.

name: phthoggos
text: I love Ray's black turtleneck. It always comes out when Art is being created.

name: 60teeth
text: Does Ray have enough of a neck for it to be considered a turtleneck?

name: envika
text: turtleneck tom!

name: paperboy_2000
text:
Belushi, Farley, Squirrel...

Todd has found a career where being fat and having a taste for hard drugs go at the top of the resume.

name: mobro_4000
text: Todd's working some rough chuckles these days.

name: heyheyheyhey
text: Roast Beef has been sitting on this idea for months, waiting for someone to ask him for sketch-comedy help.

name: mikemcg
text: I just realized, if those are indeed housecats, Todd is a tiny, tiny squirrel.

name: cuddlefish
text: birthday strip! they're awesome every year! I do miss BLISTER though! hope he comes back for a strip soon.

name: envika
text: todd gets it so much, he's shaking!

name: charchar
text: That's DTs ; Todd is in withdrawal because the whole time Beef's been explaining the joke, Todd's been getting soberer and soberer...

name: pygmalion00
text: When I first saw it, I voted a 4, but after I saw the alt text, I changed it to 5.

name: falseprophet
text: Ray is known for his penchant for theatrics , which, I guess, in this case, are the theatrics of behind-the-scenes theatrics.

name: aplomb
text: There's a meta-joke going on here: Roast Beef juxtaposed with loudness = hilarity.

name: thatcrazycommie
text: Dear god, I think that's the biggest Roast Beef's font has ever been!

name: seanbad
text: Not quite .

name: mattylite
text: BRUK

name: theoneyouwant
text: sometimes i wish the rating system had half beefs. clearly, this strip is not a three, and yet i don't think i can give it a four... so torn.

name: bluejay
text: this is smashing against the inside top of 5, bro

name: bluejay
text: Another way to put it, this comix is hitting the cervix of the rating system.

name: beck
text: I wonder how could she know?

name: lobster_mobster
text: The fourth panel absolutely MAKES this comic. I love the way Beef's eyes look when he's excited, just the littlest bit bowed forward and just big lines.

name: nonanon
text:
The next day:

F-F-Frick! What j-j-jerkwad put me in a frikkin' doctor outfit with barf in it? And where did this drowned baby come from? F-Frick!

name: jhunter
text:
Is Todd dressed like a chef or a scientist in that last panel?

How come?

name: tekende
text: Because he's playing Emeril.

name: i_love_kate
text: Jhunter did not Follow this strip.

name: jhunter
text: it's much funnier now I know, though!

name: aaron_haynes
text: That baby has motion lines! It is an actual baby!

name: i_love_kate
text: Ray is not at all tight when it comes to budgeting.

name: goriasxy
text: Fourth panel makes this an instant 5.

name: duperando
text: Puddin' and Jell-O.
